Vibank Judo Club
Contact: Kate Schneider, Yondan
(306)-762-4629
judomom.kate@sasktel.net
Contact: Dianne Dornstauder, Shodan
(306)-762-2136
ddornstauder@hotmail.com

Season: Early September to end of April

Class Times:
  • Wednesdays 6:00 - 7:00 for beginners
  • 7:00 - 8:30 for intermediate

    Registration Form: Download the registration form here


    Fees:
    $250 for the season which includes Judo Sask and Judo Canada Fees.
    We have a family rate - pay individual rate for the first two and $75 for each of the rest.
